metadata.synopsis: Boo died and a long rest has to happen before summoning him again.

0.speaker: Minsc
0.text: SHHH! Can you not see that Boo is resting? Poke again tomorrow, you monster.
0.context: NodeContext: Loud Minsc whisper - should be directed, tongue in cheek, at player - we've just tried to use Boo but a long rest is required first.
